job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We have an exciting new job opening for a Generative AI Scientist in our Rapid Response Team. We are looking for a creative candidate who thrives on curiosity and learning, who has a passion to innovate, and enjoys a challenge. If you are that kind of scientist consider joining our team of thinkers and doers to drive innovation at the intersection of discovery and action!

   This position is in our Eindhoven-based Rapid Response Team (RRT), part of the Data and AI group at Thermo Fisher Scientific. The RRT is a multidisciplinary team focused on unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes. The team moves quickly, progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks.

   As a creative force in the RRT, you'll explore and showcase new GenAI technologies for future products and processes. Your role involves iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions, and preparing demos and reports. You'll collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization., * Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
     * Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
     * Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific to define and integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products.
     * Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.
job_details.full_text:
Engineer III, Artificial Intelligence

We have an exciting new job opening for a Generative AI Scientist in our Rapid Response Team. We are looking for a creative candidate who thrives on curiosity and learning, who has a passion to innovate, and enjoys a challenge. If you are that kind of scientist consider joining our team of thinkers and doers to drive innovation at the intersection of discovery and action!

   This position is in our Eindhoven-based Rapid Response Team (RRT), part of the Data and AI group at Thermo Fisher Scientific. The RRT is a multidisciplinary team focused on unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes. The team moves quickly, progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks.

   As a creative force in the RRT, you'll explore and showcase new GenAI technologies for future products and processes. Your role involves iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions, and preparing demos and reports. You'll collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization., * Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
     * Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
     * Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific to define and integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products.
     * Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes 'Generative AI', 'GenAI technologies', and 'application of generative AI'. The core responsibilities include developing proof-of-concepts for GenAI in products and R&D, staying updated on GenAI advancements, and collaborating to integrate AI methods. This aligns directly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and deploying applications based on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI' directly relates to creating and demonstrating models or applications using generative AI techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI' implies continuous learning and application of new modeling techniques within the GenAI domain.
job_tasks.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products' suggests the application and integration of AI models into end-user products, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes' indicates an understanding of how AI can serve business objectives and improve processes.
job_tasks.phrase: unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Rapid Response Team' and progressing 'from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks' implies a fast-paced development and deployment cycle, characteristic of MLOps practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams
